vote.title: In  honor of the 40th Anniversary of the Ronald McDonald House in Columbus, Ohio and the Ground Breaking for a major expansion of the Ronald McDonald House
vote.description:
Title
In  honor of the 40th Anniversary of the Ronald McDonald House in Columbus, Ohio and the Ground Breaking for a major expansion of the Ronald McDonald House
 
Body
WHEREAS, the Ronald McDonald House is a home away from home for families of hospitalized children in Columbus, Ohio; and
 
WHEREAS, the Ronald McDonald House in Columbus, Ohio opened its doors to families on March 17, 1982; and
 
WHEREAS, the Ronald McDonald House in Columbus, Ohio has served over 1,000,000 families since opening; and
 
WHEREAS, the Ronald McDonald House is breaking ground on a major expansion of the facility on March 23, 2022; and
 
WHEREAS, the Ronald McDonald House is celebrating the 40th Anniversary of serving families from all over the world at the local Ronald McDonald House; now therefore
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: That this Council does hereby recognize, and congratulates Ronald McDonald House Charities of Central Ohio on its 40th Anniversary and the Ground Breaking of the expansion of the Ronald McDonald House.
